Battery performance could have been better. For heavy users, an evening top-up is required. For normal usage, it lasts the whole day.READ MORE

I have been using the Galaxy S24 for some time now and I am really happy with it. The phone feels very premium in hand and the display is bright, smooth and perfect for watching videos. Performance is super fast, apps open instantly and everything runs buttery smooth.Battery life is solid too. I am a light user with no gaming and I usually get around 7 hours of screen on time, which easily lasts me the whole day. The cameras are excellent, sharp photos and natural colors even in low light....READ MORE

I am writing this review after 10-15 days of usage. This phone is really a beast. I was using iphones before as they feel handy. I always had a second thought if this really meet my expectation comparing iphones. I must say it was beyond my expectation. Thanks flipkart. Pros : Display, Device performance and premium feelCons : Battery gets drains easily when you use frequent camera and slight heat up the device lStill for the price and features this phone offers its a damm crazy device....READ MORE
